description: 22 kilometre loop in the Edmonton River Valley. Three 50+ metre ascents. Mostly asphalt trail with gravel or dirt sidetrails for off-roading.
directions: I usually start on Saskatchewan Drive, but you could start anywhere along the trail. The trail has several road accesses along its length.Edmonton City provides a Cycle trail map which shows trails on both sides of the river from Terwilliger park to Strathcona Science park and beyond.see Edmonton city website www.edmonton.ca/cycling
title: Edmonton River Valley Loop (22k)
